msg.generateRolltableFromCompendiumWithFilte: BRT Generate rolltable with Filters (BETA Tested only on Dnd5e).
msg.startRolltableGeneration: Starting generation of rolltable for {title} ({name}) with {compendiumSize} entries.

Buttons.GenerateLootTooltip: Generate Loot on existent Actor or a new one
Buttons.GenerateHarvestTooltip: Generate Harvest on existent Actor or a new one

Reroll.Title: Show Reroll buttons
Reroll.Description: Display a Reroll button on each result card of a roll on a rolltable (only for newly created cards). Work only on loot chat card or if condensed roll output is enabled. Default tables are not affected.

Open.Title: Show `Open` buttons
Open.Description: Display a open button on each result message of a roll on a rolltable (only for newly created cards). Work only on loot chat card or if condensed roll output is enabled. Default tables are not affected.

better-rolltables.HarvestDcValuePlaceholder: Add a formulas or a number e.g.: 1d4 or 13
better-rolltables.HarvestSkillValuePlaceholder: The key of the skill used. Is the key property not the label so for example on Dnd5e if is 'Dexterity' we use 'dex', or 'Arcana' we use 'arc'
better-rolltables.LootActorName: Add Loot to Actor with this specific name
better-rolltables.LootActorNamePlaceholder: If empty it will create a new loot actor every time
better-rolltables.HarvestActorName: Add harvest to Actor with this specific name
better-rolltables.HarvestActorNamePlaceholder: If empty it will create a new harvest actor every time
better-rolltables.BetterRollAmountPlaceholder: Roll the entire table multiple times
better-rolltables.LootRollAmountPlaceholder: Roll the entire table multiple times
better-rolltables.HarvestRollAmountPlaceholder: Roll the entire table multiple times

AdvancedSettings.Title: BetterRolltables Advanced Settings
AdvancedSettings.Description: Some more advanced settings for BetterRolltables

UI.Title: UI Settings
UI.Description: Settings for the UI of BetterRolltables

Loot.Title: Loot Settings
Loot.Description: Settings for the Loot of BetterRolltables

Harvest.Title: Harvest Settings
Harvest.Description: Settings for the Harvest of BetterRolltables

Tags.Title: Tags Settings
Tags.Description: Settings for the Tags of BetterRolltables

enableOldBehavior.Title: Enable Old Behavior
enableOldBehavior.Description: Re-enable the old 1.9.X behaviour if you really want...

LootSheet.Title: Sheet to use for Generated Loot
LootSheet.Description: You can set an alternate npc sheets to be used for the generated loot to have upon creation

SpellCompendium.Title: Spell Compendium
SpellCompendium.Description: You can specify a spell compendium and when a scroll is picked from a loot table (they need to have a specific name) a random spell is rolled from this compendium

ShowWarningBeforeReroll.Title: Confirm reroll ?
ShowWarningBeforeReroll.Description: Show a confirm dialog before reroll message content.

UseCondensedBetterRoll.Title: Use condensed roll output
UseCondensedBetterRoll.Description: If enabled, this will aggregate same output with a multiplier to save space. This option may speed up rolltable draws. Default tables are not affected.

AddRollInRolltableContextMenu.Title: Roll from rolltable contextmenu
AddRollInRolltableContextMenu.Description: Add an option in rolltable's contextmenu to roll table without opening it. Work on all table type.

AddRollInCompediumContextMenu.Title: Roll from compendium contextmenu
AddRollInCompediumContextMenu.Description: Add an option in compendium's contextmenu to roll on this compendium without creating rolltable from it. Work on all non-empty compendiums.

RerollWarning.Title: Reroll?
RerollWarning.Description: Message content will be lost. Are you sure you want to reroll?

RollTableFromJournal.Title: Add roll button to tables in journal entries?
RollTableFromJournal.Description: If enabled, a roll button is added to linked tables in journal entries.

ShareCurrencyButton.Title: Show share currency button?
ShareCurrencyButton.Description: Show a button on mesage to share currency (if any) (dnde only)

AlwaysShowGeneratedLootAsMessage.Title: Always show generated loot to actor as message
AlwaysShowGeneratedLootAsMessage.Description: If enabled, generated loot added to an actor is also displayed as a message.

AlwaysShowGeneratedHarvestAsMessage.Title: Always show generated harvest to actor as message
AlwaysShowGeneratedHarvestAsMessage.Description: If enabled, generated harvest added to an actor is also displayed as a message.

Use.Title: Use Tags
Use.Description: Allow assigning tags rolltables with curstom tags.

Defaults.Title: Default Tags
Defaults.Description: Default Tags to be assigned to tables. This could be useful if you work on alot of tables.

Warnings.MaxRecursion: Recursion depth of {maxRecursions} exceeded when attempting to draw from RollTable {tableId}
Warnings.NotTableByNameInPack: No table named {tableName} found in compendium {packName}, did you misspell your table name in brackets?
Warnings.CurrencyFormat: Currency loot field contain wrong formatting, currencies need to be define as "diceFormula[currencyType]" => "1d100[gp]" but was {currencyString}

label.tableTextGmTitleLabel: THIS IS THE CHAT CARD ONLY FOR GM
label.tableTextDistinctResult: Distinct result: if checked the same result is not selected more than once indifferently from the number of 'Amount Roll'
label.tableTextDistinctResultKeepRolling: Distinct result but Keep Rolling: if 'Distinct result' is checked and 'Amount Rolls' > of the numbers of the result, keep rolling as a normal 'Roll +' behavior
label.tableTextHiddenTable: Hidden Table: if checked the result drawn from this table are visible only to gms on the chat
label.tableTextHiddenShowResultOnChat: If the table is hidden drawn table results will be show on the chat card as unknown items to players
label.NormalizeRanges:
Normalize ranges according to result weight.

Result ranges are set to appropriate values based on weight.

Also updates the roll table formula.
label.NormalizeWeights:
Normalize weights according to result range.

Result weights are set to appropriate value based on range.
label.dcHint: DC: minimum value of the DC if present and > 0
label.skillHint: Skill: the skill string used for filter the results
